import React, { useState } from "react"; // import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Card, Col, Container, Image, Row, Button, Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css"; import "./UserItem.css"; const UserItem = props => { const [showDetail, setShowDetail] = useState(false); const openDetailHandler = () => setShowDetail(true); const closeDetailHandler = () => setShowDetail(false); return ( {props.name}

{props.name}

Age : {props.age} Score : {props.score} Interest : {props.interest.map} Bio Online ? Interets Genre ); }; export default UserItem;
